thread.title: Geek deals: Lenovo Ideapad 500 dual-core 15.6-inch laptop for $749
thread.title_full: Geek deals: Lenovo Ideapad 500 dual-core 15.6-inch laptop for $749

author: Editor - Technology News
title: Geek deals: Lenovo Ideapad 500 dual-core 15.6-inch laptop for $749
text:
Posted on October 20, 2015 by Editor - Technology News 
For a limited time, you can snag a 15.6-inch Ideapad 500 dual-core laptop from Lenovo for just $749. With a spacious solid state hybrid drive, loads of RAM, and a brand new Skylake CPU, this laptop is a steal with today’s 34% discount in place. Lenovo Ideapad 500 dual-core 15.6-inch laptop for $749 (List price: $1149.99 — Coupon code: USPI5QUS108 ) 
On the inside, this model features a sixth generation dual-core 2.4GHz Intel Core i7-6500U processor, a discrete AMD Meso XT graphics card (with 2GB of memory), 16GB of DDR3L RAM (1600MHz), a 1TB SSHD, a DVD burner, Bluetooth 4.0, and 802.11b/g/n/ac WiFi support. The 15.6-inch display sports a 1080p resolution, LED lighting, and an anti-glare coating. And thanks to the built-in HDMI and VGA ports, you’ll be able to hook up to nearly any monitor or HDTV. 
The Ideapad 500 weighs in at a little over five pounds, and the battery lasts about four hours between charges. It’s not a great fit for heavy travelers, but it is an excellent desktop replacement. So if you’re looking for a laptop that you’ll mostly just use around the house or office, this is a smart investment. 
Typically, this model sells for $1149.99, but Lenovo is selling it online for just $799. When you use coupon code “ USPI5QUS108 ” during your checkout process, you’ll save an additional fifty bucks. Factor in Lenovo’s free shipping, and your value here is even better. 
And if you don’t need as much RAM, you can grab an 8GB configuration for just $699 using coupon code “ USPI5QUS108 “. For less than seven hundred bucks, that’s a really impressive setup.
